pages.text: Grilling food using a Shichirin Stove adds a potion effect to the baked food. $(br2)Put Coal, Charcoal or Bamboo Charcoal by a Hopper or right-clicking, and ignite with an Amber Igniter. Use an Uchiwa to control the heat.

If UNDERCOOKED is written on the cooked food, you will get Hunger effect. If WELL-COOKED, you will get Regeneration effect. If OVERCOOKED, you will get Poison effect.$(br2)The higher the level number, the stronger the effect. $(br2)If WELL COOKED LEVEL 5 is written, you will get Absorption effect as well as Regeneration effect.
